Record.ClassificationPath: Nervous System Diseases/Central Nervous System Diseases/Brain Diseases/Hypothalamic Diseases/Pituitary Diseases/Empty Sella Syndrome
Endocrine System Diseases/Pituitary Diseases/Empty Sella Syndrome
Record.Description: A condition when the SELLA TURCICA is not filled with pituitary tissue. The pituitary gland is either compressed, atrophied, or removed. There are two types: (1) primary empty sella is due a defect in the sella diaphragm leading to arachnoid herniation into the sellar space; (2) secondary empty sella is associated with the removal or treatment of PITUITARY NEOPLASMS.
